judges: Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.

opinions.text:
Opinion
Per Curiam,
The order of the court below granting a new trial is affirmed.
opinions.author: Per Curiam,

attorneys: Norman Paul Harvey, with him Charles Robert Bernsee, and Hebert, Harvey, Herting & Short, for appellant.
casebody.head_matter:
Lifschutz v. Rosenbluth, Appellant.
Argued November 11, 1964.
Before Bell, C. J., Musmanno, Jones, Cohen, Eagen, O’Brien and Roberts, JJ.
January 5, 1965:
Norman Paul Harvey, with him Charles Robert Bernsee, and Hebert, Harvey, Herting & Short, for appellant.
Joseph D. Shein, for appellee.
